values.value: This is the step where Business will approve the SKU(s) submitted by the vendor and approved by the Buyer.
This is the step where Business will approve the SKU(s) submitted by the vendor and approved by the Buyer.

varItemType:=GetContextPath["classification"];varFirstIndex:=indexof[varItemType, "/"];varProductType:=IIF[varFirstIndex > 0, substring[varItemType, 0, varFirstIndex], ""];varRemainingString:=IIF[varFirstIndex > 0,  substring[varItemType, varFirstIndex + 1, len[varItemType] - varFirstIndex - 1], ""];varIndexInRemaining:=indexof[varRemainingString, "/"];varSecondIndex:=IIF[varFirstIndex > 0 AND varIndexInRemaining > 0, indexof[varRemainingString, "/"], len[varRemainingString]];varSubProductType:=IIF[varFirstIndex > 0 AND varSecondIndex > 0, substring[varRemainingString, 0, varSecondIndex], ""];IIF[varFirstIndex > 0 AND varSecondIndex > 0, SetAttributeValueInContext["self:self","productType",varProductType] AND SetAttributeValueInContext["self:self","subProductType",varSubProductType] AND SetAttributeValueInContext["self:self","itemType",varItemType], true]
This is the step where the Buyer will approve the SKU (s) submitted by the vendor.
Invoke Update Workflow based on the Cost Attribute

var1:=IsEntityInWorkflow["UpdateProductWorkflow"];var2:=HasAttributesChanged["cost"];IIF[var1, true, IIF[var2, InvokeWorkflow["UpdateProductWorkflow"], true]] AND IIF[var1, true, IIF[IsEntityInWorkflow["newProductSetup"] or var2, true, InitiateExport["sku_Kinesis_JSON_Export_Publish"]]]

IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["seoDescription"],true,SetAttributeValue["seoDescription",Concat["buy",GetAttributevalue["productName"],"today at jcpenney.com. You deserve great deals and we’ve got them at jcp!"]]] AND IIF[GetAttributevalue["subProductType"]="Small" AND GetAttributevalue["subProductType"]="Large appliance",SetAttributeValue["seoTitle:",Concat[GetAttributevalue["fullProductName"],"-", GetAttributevalue["modelNumber"],"-","JCPenney"]],SetAttributeValue["seoTitle:",Concat[GetAttributevalue["fullProductName"],"-","JCPenney"]]]AND SetAttributeValue["seoDisplayName",GetAttributevalue["productName"]]

varLength:=GetAttributeValue["length"];varWidth:=GetAttributeValue["width"];varHeight:=GetAttributeValue["height"];varGrossWeight:=GetAttributeValue["grossweight"];unitedInches:=0;dimW:=0;dimWRdup:=0;maxSide:=0;billingWeight:=0;baseCost:=0;IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[varLength],SetVariable["varLength", 0],false] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[varWidth],SetVariable["varWidth", 0],false] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[varHeight],SetVariable["varHeight", 0],false] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[varGrossWeight],SetVariable["varGrossWeight", 0],false] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[unitedInches],true,SetVariable["unitedInches", ((varLength + varWidth + varHeight)*2 - NumericMax[varLength,varWidth,varHeight]) ]] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[dimW],true,SetVariable["dimW", ((varLength + varWidth + varHeight)/250)]] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[dimWRdup],true,SetVariable["dimWRdup", round[dimW + 0.99]]] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[billingWeight],true,SetVariable["billingWeight", NumericMax[dimWRdup,varGrossWeight]]] AND IIF[billingWeight>=1 AND billingWeight<=10,SetVariable["baseCost",5.62],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=11 AND billingWeight<=20,SetVariable["baseCost",7.49],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=21 AND billingWeight<=30,SetVariable["baseCost",8.62],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=31 AND billingWeight<=40,SetVariable["baseCost",11.18],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=41 AND billingWeight<=50,SetVariable["baseCost",13.40],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=51 AND billingWeight<=60,SetVariable["baseCost",14.90],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=61 AND billingWeight<=70,SetVariable["baseCost",16.14],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=71 AND billingWeight<=80,SetVariable["baseCost",29.80],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=81 AND billingWeight<=90,SetVariable["baseCost",35.79],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=91 AND billingWeight<=100,SetVariable["baseCost",39.51],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=101 AND billingWeight<=110,SetVariable["baseCost",43.12],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=111 AND billingWeight<=120,SetVariable["baseCost",46.57],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=121 AND billingWeight<=130,SetVariable["baseCost",50.01],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=131 AND billingWeight<=140,SetVariable["baseCost",53.52],false] AND IIF[billingWeight>=141 AND billingWeight<=150,SetVariable["baseCost",57.04],false] AND IIF[IsNullOrEmpty[maxSide],true,SetVariable["maxSide", NumericMax[varLength,varWidth,varHeight]]] AND IIF[unitedInches<135 and varGrossWeight<150,SetAttributeValue["estimatedupsshippingcharge",(baseCost+ 0.5+1.39)],false] AND IIF[maxSide>60 and varGrossWeight>150,SetAttributeValue["estimatedupsshippingcharge",(baseCost+ 3.0+1.64)],false] AND IIF[unitedInches>135 and unitedInches<165,SetAttributeValue["estimatedupsshippingcharge",(baseCost+ 68.0+10.38]),false] AND IIF[unitedInches>165,SetAttributeValue["estimatedupsshippingcharge",150],false ]

reqimageFormat:=".jpg";reqcolorProfile:="sRGB embedded";reqimageResolution:=300;reqimageResolutionUM:="dpi(pixels/inch)";reqimageWidthMin:= 1000;reqimageWidthMax:=3000;reqimageHeightMin:= 1000;reqimageHeightMax:=3000;reqimageWidthUM:="pixels";reqimageHeightUM:="pixels";IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageFormat"]<>reqimageFormat,AddAttributeError["RST001", "", "imageFormat"],false]AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["colorProfile"]<>reqcolorProfile,AddAttributeError["RST002", "", "colorProfile"],false]AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageResolution"]<>reqimageResolution,AddAttributeError["RST003", "", "imageResolution"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageResolutionUM"]<> reqimageResolutionUM,AddAttributeError["RST004", "", "imageResolutionUM"],false]AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageWidth"]<reqimageWidthMin or GetAttributeValue["imageWidth"]>reqimageWidthMax,AddAttributeError["RST005", "", "imageWidth"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageHeight"]<reqimageHeightMin or GetAttributeValue["imageHeight"]>reqimageHeightMax,AddAttributeError["RST006", "", "imageHeight"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageWidthUM"]<>reqimageWidthUM,AddAttributeError["RST007", "", "imageWidthUM"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageHeightUM"]<>reqimageHeightUM,AddAttributeError["RST008", "", "imageHeightUM"],false]

reqImageFormat:=".jpg";reqColorProfile:="sRGB embedded";reqImageResolution:=300;reqImageResolutionUM:="dpi(pixels/inch)";reqImageWidth:=200;reqImageHeight:=200;reqImageWidthUM:="pixels";reqImageHeightUM:="pixels";IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageFormat"]<>reqImageFormat,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageFormat"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["colorProfile"]<>reqColorProfile,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "colorProfile"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageResolution"]<>reqImageResolution,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageResolution"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageResolutionUM"]<> reqImageResolutionUM,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageResolutionUM"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageWidth"]<>reqImageWidth,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageWidth"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageHeight"]<>reqImageHeight,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageHeight"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageWidthUM"]<>reqImageWidthUM,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageWidthUM"],false] AND IIF[GetAttributeValue["imageHeightUM"]<>reqImageHeightUM,AddAttributeError["InvalidImage", "", "imageHeightUM"],false]
Syncing of create and update workflow
Syncing of create and update workflow
Buyer requests additional information from the Vendor by clicking “Request for Info” button on the UI. Buyer has provided the information to be requested as Comments

IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["image"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","image"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["imageName"],AddAttributeError["Req001","","imageName"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["productDescription"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","productDescription"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["searchKeywordsNavigation"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","searchKeywordsNavigation"],false] AND  IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["itemType"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","itemType"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["colorFamily"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","colorFamily"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["printPattern"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","printPattern"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["countryOfManufacture"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","countryOfManufacture"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["assembledLength"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","assembledLength"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["assembledWidth"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","assembledWidth"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["assembledHeight"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","assembledHeight"],false]AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["assembledWeight"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","assembledWeight"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["shipPointCity"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","shipPointCity"],false] AND IIF[ValidateEmptyAttributes["shipPointState"],AddAttributeError["Req001", "","shipPointState"],false]
Once the SKU is created the vendor has the option to update attributes that the vendor has permission to.
Action Performed: Vendor has filled the required attributes for SKU submission.Next Workflow Step: Review Assortment
